p: Ellagic acid ( 4) was isolated as a brown amorphous solid. The molecular ion [M − H] − m/z 301 obtained using UPLC-MS/MS is consistent with the molecular formula C 14H 6O 8. The 1H spectrum showed a singlet at δ H 7.45, while the 13C NMR spectrum showed seven aromatic signals at δ C 107, 110, 112, 136, 140, 148, 159 ( Figure S5), which are consistent with the spectral data reported in literature for ellagic acid [ 35, 36].
